DOC.brief_title: Multifocals Accommodating/Bilateral Implantation Different Multifocal Intraocular Lens ( IOLs )
DOC.detailed_description: STUDY DESIGN : This prospective , non-randomized , unmasked pilot study . 1 . SETTING : Storm Eye Institute , Medical University South Carolina , Charleston , SC 2 . SUBJECTS A total 50 patient sexes race ethnic background underwent uneventful routine bilateral cataract extraction multifocal accommodate intraocular lens implantation include . Subjects divide 5 group 10 subject base IOL implanted follow : ReSTOR +4.0 D , ReSTOR +3.0 D , Crystalens , ReZoom , Mix-and-match ( patient implant ReSTOR one eye ReZoom fellow eye ) . Assessment include thorough medical history complete eye examination . The latter include ETDRS visual acuity distance ( 4 mt ) , intermediate ( 60 cm ) near ( 33 40 cm accordingly lens , photopic condition ) evaluate uncorrected best-corrected well distance-corrected near intermediate visual acuity , , range vision ( uncorrected distance-corrected ) ; previous test do per eye eye ( visual summation ) . Slit-lamp exam , eye dominance , stereopsis , pupil size photopic condition , corneal topography satisfaction questionnaire evaluate well . A defocus curve perform follow : phoropter 100 % contrast ETDRS chart position 4 meter subject photopic light condition use . Manifest refraction use designate zero ( 0 ) baseline . To begin test , subject defocused -5.00 D spherical correction best distance correction ( manifest refraction ) . The logMAR acuity refraction record . Minus spherical power decrease 0.50 D increment ( i.e. , -4.50 D , -4.00 D , -3.50 D , etc . ) logMAR acuity record change correction best distance correction ( manifest refraction ) remain . DOC.criteria: Subjects MUST fulfill follow condition qualify enrollment trial Subject must multifocal accommodate IOL implant bilaterally . Age : 40 90 year old . At least 3 month cataract extraction intraocular lens implantation second eye . Willing able comply schedule visit study procedure . Subjects ANY follow condition eligibility exam may NOT enrolled trial . Ocular pathology affect visual acuity : amblyopia , rubella cataract , proliferative diabetic retinopathy , shallow anterior chamber , macular edema , retinal detachment , aniridia iris atrophy , uveitis , history iritis , iris neovascularization , medically uncontrolled glaucoma , microphthalmus macrophthalmus , optic nerve atrophy , macular degeneration ( best postoperative visual acuity le 20/30 ) , advance glaucomatous damage , etc . Keratometric astigmatism exceed 2.00 diopter . Planned postoperative refraction monovision . Uncontrolled diabetes . Use systemic topical drug know interfere visual performance . Contact lens use active treatment portion trial . Any concurrent infectious/non infectious conjunctivitis , keratitis uveitis . Pregnant nursing mother females childbearing potential practicing reliable medically acceptable method birth control . Participation ( current participation ) investigational drug device trial within previous 30 day prior start date trial . Intraocular conventional surgery within past three month intraocular laser surgery within one month either eye . Other ocular surgery time cataract extraction .
